description:
A modern file manager for Windows 10 and Windows 11.

OneCommander is a modern file manager for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Features include tabs, dual-pane browsers, columns navigation, built-in preview, a theming system, color tags, and much more. It is free for home use and has no ads.
üõ†Ô∏è Workaround for Microsoft Photos opening web-downloaded images with annoying popup. Now one-time popup shown to give user a choice for future action
üêû Fixed issue opening some file types when Windows file associations break
!! Archive extraction has been removed. 7zip library has several vulnerabilities so we'll wait for an update from the library developer.
Please use an external archiver for now (be aware that if that external archiver is based on 7zip it might have the same vulnerabilities).
Note that Bandizip used to cause OC crashing; not tested recently but you may want to consider a different one.
Built-in compressing to archive is still supported.
